data.name: Alexander Romanov
data.injury: Romanov (shoulder) will have surgery and be out 5-6 months, the team announced Sunday.

data.name: Pierre Engvall
data.injury: Engvall (ankle) was placed on long-term injured reserve Thursday.

data.name: Semyon Varlamov
data.injury: Varlamov (knee), as expected, was placed on injured reserve Monday.

data.name: Ethan Bear
data.injury: Bear (undisclosed) was put on injured reserve Monday.
